title: TheMarkest.art – Glitch Image + Portrait
metaDescription: Artist's portfolio in a sci‑fi/cyberpunk style, featuring a wave, old monitor effect, TextScramble, pixel glitch logo, artist photo, and convenient work cards.

about.bioText: Mark Bogdanov — an artist working at the intersection of art, technology, and engineering aesthetics. In his works, he explores the influence of scientific progress on visual forms, combining modern production methods with traditional materials. Born in 1998, his art has been shaped against the backdrop of the digital revolution and deep cultural traditions.
about.statementText: I create sculptures in which modern production technologies meet the legacy of past engineering thought. My art is a search for form, structure, and material that reflect the logic of scientific progress. In my works, I combine 3D printing, laser cutting, and digital processing, striving to show a dialogue between the past and the future.
